meanings.definition: Not involving any cost or payment.
meanings.sent1: The costless event was a fun way to spend the afternoon.
meanings.sent2: She received a costless gift from her friend.
meanings.sent3: The costless picnic turned out to be a delightful surprise.
meanings.sent4: His smile was as bright and costless as a summer day.
meanings.sent5: The costless service provided by the volunteers was greatly appreciated.

meanings.sent1: They offered the service costless to help those in need.
meanings.sent2: She decided to travel costless by walking instead of taking a taxi.
meanings.sent3: The magician made the rabbit disappear costlessly, leaving the audience amazed.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter rang out costlessly, filling the room with joy.
meanings.sent5: The stars shone costlessly in the night sky, lighting up the darkness.
